content.rendered:
Dilkhush Premium Rice is one of the finest Basmati Rice variants & has been a favorite of many Indian households. The rice is perfect for preparing premium indulgent feasts such as Dum Biryani, Kashmiri Pulao, Zafrani Pulao, etc. The long grains do not break while stirring, which ensures their premium quality. Serving an amazing taste and sweet earthy aroma which amplifies the rice eating experience for you & your family.
The grains do not stick to each other after being cooked, thus every grain is separated which is ideal for cooking Hyderabadi Dum Biryani.
Grown & harvested in the foothills of the Himalayas in the Indian subcontinent, this rice is full of essential vitamins & nutrients that will make your meal healthy along with a delectable taste. Organically matured for at least two years for better quantity, fluffiness & yield. The aging process also delivers the unique Basmati aroma & taste to the rice.
All Sona Cereal products are produced following international quality standards, cleaned, sorted & packed in supreme, hygienic & state-of-the-art facilities, without coming in contact with the human touch.

  • Suitable for dishes such as Dum Biryani, Pilafs, etc
  • Long & slender grains
  • Distinct aroma & fine texture
  • Durga Rice
  • Does not break or stick to each other while cooking
